main event: A stationary object was detected on ground radar, but not picked up on air-intercept radar. The object remained stationary for about 40-45 minutes before disappearing from radar. There was no visual confirmation.
interesting points: The ground-radar operator noted the detection of the object, but it could not be tracked on the air-intercept radar.
The object remained stationary and then disappeared from the radar.
No further details were available about the sighting.
The report contains two hand-drawn sketches, one depicting an object in the sky and another showing a person on a road with hills in the background.
The report includes a questionnaire with various questions about the sighting, but no photographs are present.
sighted object: unidentified stationary object detected on ground radar
